resources.string: Unlocked new knowledge about batik with Dewangga Batik Library
Capture any batik you see and found interesting information about it
Want to know any fact about batik? Read our news to find interesting fact you never heard
By continuing on this application you agree to our Terms of Use and Privacy Policy

Hello, this is Dewangga!

We are a platform for everyone interested and want to get to know Batik. This application would give you a new learning experience to learn Batik just by image. Capture the image of the Batik you see and get the information such as its name, description, origin, and another picture of it as soon as you capture the image. Not just that, you could also read news related to Batik to enhance your knowledge.

In summary, this application has three main features for you to use, which are :

1. Batik motif detection
2. News related to Batik
3. Different batik types of information

This is our first step; in the future, we plan to collaborate with UMKM, which focuses on batik production and distribution to promote Batik into society.
What we do, who we are, and what is this app
How can i help you with this app?
Based on website up to date

The batik could not be recognized.
Welcome to Dewangga, Please read the description about this application first so you know what the purpose of this apps.
Dewangga also provide news about Batik, You can access “News” in the news that we show below or click on navigation bar below to see full list of the news.
If you someday forgot about how the apps works, you can always got the tutorial again here.
Our main feature is using camera so you can identify batik pattern easily. But first you need to allow us to access your camera in order for apps to works.
You can also see the example of apps identification on batik in previous occasion here.
If you already know the type of batik, you can always find the pattern of batik type by searching what you looking for here.
You can also change the language to other language here.
Thats it you ready to go, have a nice expeience!
